text: The Ghana national under-17 football team represents Ghana in youth international football completions. They have won the FIFA U-17 World Cup twice in 1991 and 1995. They have also won the Africa U-17 Cup of Nations twice in 1995 and 1999. == Competitive Record == === FIFA U-17 World Cup Record === Year Round GP W D* L GS GA 1985 did not participate did not
